item.title: II. Examining the Bell Curve: Is Charles Murray a Racist?
item.description: Have you read The Rise of the Colored Empires by this man Goddard?… It’s a fine book and everybody ought to read it. The idea is if we don’t look out the white race will be—will be utterly submerged. It’s all scientific stuff; it’s been proved. — This idea is that we’re Nordics…and we’ve produced all the things that go to make civilization – oh, science and art and all that.
